QueryViewSpec.Name: Constituent Child Sponsorship Query
QueryViewSpec.Description: Used to view child sponsorship commitment information - including monthly amount
QueryViewSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda

ViewImplementation.ViewSQL:
select c.ID, c.LOOKUPID, c.NAME, s.ID as SPONSORSHIPID, so.ID as CHILDID, so.LOOKUPID as CHILDLOOKUPID, so_child.NAME as CHILDNAME, ft.ID as REVENUEID, ft.TRANSACTIONAMOUNT, rsch.FREQUENCY, rsch.FREQUENCYCODE, case when rsch.FREQUENCYCODE = 0 then ft.TRANSACTIONAMOUNT / 12 -- Annually when rsch.FREQUENCYCODE = 1 then ft.TRANSACTIONAMOUNT / 6 -- Semi-annually when rsch.FREQUENCYCODE = 2 then ft.TRANSACTIONAMOUNT / 3 -- Quarterly when rsch.FREQUENCYCODE = 3 then ft.TRANSACTIONAMOUNT -- Monthly when rsch.FREQUENCYCODE = 6 then ft.TRANSACTIONAMOUNT / 2 -- Bimonthly when rsch.FREQUENCYCODE = 7 then ft.TRANSACTIONAMOUNT * 2 -- Semi-Monthly when rsch.FREQUENCYCODE = 8 then (ft.TRANSACTIONAMOUNT * 26) / 12 -- Biweekly when rsch.FREQUENCYCODE = 9 then (ft.TRANSACTIONAMOUNT * 52) /12 -- Weekly end as MONTHLYSPONSORSHIPAMOUNT, rsch.NEXTTRANSACTIONDATE, s.STATUSCODE
from dbo.CONSTITUENT c join dbo.FINANCIALTRANSACTION ft on ft.CONSTITUENTID = c.ID join dbo.REVENUESCHEDULE rsch on ft.id = rsch.id join dbo.REVENUESPLIT rsplit on ft.ID = rsplit.REVENUEID join dbo.SPONSORSHIP s on s.REVENUESPLITID = rsplit.ID join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY so on so.ID = s.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILD so_child on so_child.ID = s.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID
